MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L1 and L3 postcode areas of Liverpool, affecting properties in London Road, Canterbury Way, Kempston Street, Gildart Street, Devon Street, Carver Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:18 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:32 pm on 13th October, 2020.
